title: Apache Cassandra was made for GenAI ðŸš€

transcript.text: when Cassandra developers started seeing what was happening in geni we got a little excited the people bu working on the project because we've been working on a distributed database that works at an incredible scale at global scale meaning that you can run it anywhere and everywhere in the world and it is works at a highly distributed way as well we built this thing 12 years ago we've been perfecting it over the time it's a really baked and really good database it runs probably everything you can think of in the world right now Banks Health Care insurance it even runs if you're running an iPhone it's pretty much running that so it's great
